div.p: IF HE WERE NOT A VULCAN,
EATEN AT ALL IN THREE DAYS.
FOR A LEAVE OF ANY SORT.
THEN WHY DID YOU DO IT?
ON YOUR WORD, THAT I DID IT,
BUT I DO NOT KNOW WHY,
NOR DO I REMEMBER DOING IT.
MY ORDERS WERE TO GIVE YOU
AS THIS TIME DOES TO US...
YOU CAN'T GO OFF TO VULCAN
I CAME TO TELL YOU THAT
IT HAS BEEN HELD BY US
AS IT WAS IN THE DAWN
IT IS UP TO HIM NOW.
AS IT WAS AT THE TIME
TILL ONE OF THEM IS KILLED--
ON THE VERGE OF GIVING US
